attributes.additional_details:
Remove the smoke free generation 
As it will destroy Britain 
Lower taxes on cigarettes. 
And unlift the smoke free generation
attributes.background:
Unlift The Smoke free generation
As it’s gonna destroy Britain 
Let people make their own choices and decisions in years to come.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 

"Set the age requirement to buy tobacco to 21, do not gradually increase it"

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700150
